TEST SCENARIO 1:
and $1,$2,$3
000000 00011 00010 00001 00000 000100
opcode rs    rt    rd    shamt funccode
S1= 00010
ori $4,$1,4
000101 00001 00100 0000000000000100
S1= 00010
4= 0000000000000100
$4= 000……000110
lw $1,2($2)
001000 00010 00001 0000000000000010
4.adresdeki değeri $1 e aldık 6 olacak eşit olması için
beq $1,$4,10
S1= 000110
S4= 000110
10*4 = 40 + 4 +PC (3*4) =56/4 =14
100011 00001 00100 0000000000001010
14. İnstructiona gidecek
14. intruction => addi $1,$2,5 s1 = 7
000010 00010 00001 0000000000000101
15. intruction => sub $5,$1,$3	 7-3  s5= 4
00000000001001100010100000000011
16=> sw $5,15($2)
$5 yani 4 değerini 17 . adrese yaz 
01000000010001010000000000001111
